summary: Changes all Housecarls so they use a retextured version of Madcat221\'s Robed Steel Plate, and adds a matching craftable version to the forge.
descriptionHtml:
Simply ..... this mod changes all housecarls, including the 3 from Hearthfire (separate esp file included in download) so they use a retexed version of Madcat221\'s Robed Steel Plate armor.

The versions on the Housecarls are equal to the Steel Armor they normally wear so as to not screw with game balance early on (though boots and gloves ARE normal steel plate didn\'t think about that until now). I\'ve also added a craftable version to the forge. It has all the same stats and requirements as normal steel plate armor.

INSTALLATION:
Open archive, Drag and drop files into your DATA folder
If you are running Hearthfire then use both files, as the base one affects only vanilla housecarls and the Hearthfires only affects housecarls added by Hearthfire ;) 

If you Housecarls are showing up naked then just open the console ... click on gthe housecarl and then do a disable command followed by enable immediatley after. DO NOT CLOSE CONSOLE BEFORE RE-ENABLING

I\'ll tweak the description here later when I\'m not passing out ;)
author: hideouscircus
